content.html: I miss the good old days when developers/programmers own and write on their blogs ☹️☹️ The bulk of my learning was from reading blogs and learning from people's written experiences. Blogs such as Codinghorror were my favourite.
content.value:
I miss the good old days when developers/programmers own and write on their blogs ☹️☹️

The bulk of my learning was from reading blogs and learning from people's written experiences. 

Blogs such as Codinghorror were my favourite.
